message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this unique product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start the negotiation at $1,200,000, which is the minimum I'm willing to sell it for.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but that price is outside of my budget.  I'm really interested in this product, but I can only offer $800,000 at this time. Let me know what you think.

I understand that $1,200,000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer you a compromise at $1,000,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great deal considering the value this product will bring to you.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but I'm still a bit out of my comfort zone at $1,000,000.  I'm willing to go up to $900,000. This would be a fair deal for both of us, and I'm eager to get this product. What do you say?

I understand that you're trying to find a sweet spot, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $950,000, but I'm not going any lower than that. This is as close to your offer as I can get, and I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
